post.summary: Performs multiple mutations in a linear and atomic manner.

requestBody.description: An array of mutation operations. For syntax, see the [Atomic Operations documentation](https://jsonapi.org/ext/atomic/).

200.description: All operations were successfully applied, which resulted in additional changes.

204.description: All operations were successfully applied, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

403.description: An operation is not accessible or a client-generated ID is used.

404.description: A resource or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

200.description: Successfully returns the found staff-members, or an empty array if none were found.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

Content-Length.description: Size of the HTTP response body, in bytes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

get.summary: Retrieves the related staff-member identity of an individual supermarket's store-manager relationship.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the supermarket whose related staff-member identity to retrieve.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

200.description: Successfully returns the found staff-member identity, or `null` if it was not found.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

head.summary: Retrieves the related staff-member identity of an individual supermarket's store-manager relationship without returning it.
head.description: Compare the returned ETag HTTP header with an earlier one to determine if the response has changed since it was fetched.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the supermarket whose related staff-member identity to retrieve.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

Content-Length.description: Size of the HTTP response body, in bytes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

patch.summary: Assigns an existing staff-member to the store-manager relationship of an individual supermarket.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the supermarket whose store-manager relationship to assign.

requestBody.description: The identity of the staff-member to assign to the store-manager relationship.

204.description: The store-manager relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The supermarket or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.
